‚Ä¶ was open and dinner was good. Everyone was friendly and very helpful. The next morning we fueled and showered. Showers were some of the nicest and cleanest I've ever been in (4 years on the road). My wife's first truck stop shower and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ However, due to their recent increase in shower prices (Now $14!) and a new policy that doesn't allow the shop to give you shower credits, even when you are having thousands of dollars of work done, I'm only giving Petro/TA 3 stars from now ‚Ä¶

Shout out to Thomas the shower guy he has the best attitude and is always willing to help no matter what. Every time I have stoped for a shower here and he is working you can be sure he will see you and go out of his way to greet you.
Average truck stop.  Thanks to me I put a stop to the gay guy touching men's shoulders on way to shower.   I had the regional manager involved.   Other than that it's ok

Thank you Thomas! üòÅ ‚Ä¶

It's the best truck stop pair in the business.

I love the place, for the peaceful environment they have, quick and accurate service, friendly people, clean shower and of course good food too.

Calling it a Petro is misleading. Has the same amount of truck spots as a ta or ta express. Doesn't have a iron skillet and only has 5 showers. The staff seems friendly and the place seems clean but all they have is a popeyes. There's some hotels in the area and an ihop.
Like every Petro location, place is clean, many parking spots available staff is friendly

We stopped here super early - 5:15 am. Clean outside, clean store inside and a very clean restroom! Both the men's room (and from Mrs. K., the ladies) were super clean. No papers on the counter, no water on the floor, clean smell. Fabulous. ‚Ä¶

This is By Far the nicest Petro we have ever stopped in for gas! The customer service is very kind and professional, the store is nice, neat and clean and the restrooms are very nice and clean. We are transporters and frequently stop at truck stops. This one is impressive- 5 stars deserved!!

This place is one of my favorite places to stop on the way from Florida. There's a huge selection of hand made candies, fudges, and last minute state gifts. The restrooms were clean. Most importantly the staff is always super polite. I love this place.

showerReviews.reviewText: One star. Love‚Äôs used to be a place where truckers could count on a little decency‚Äîhot showers, a place to rest, and some basic respect. But now they‚Äôve made it clear: community and goodwill are no longer welcome here. Their new policy ‚Ä¶
Although a fairly new truck stop in Valdosta GA, they don't offer a well cleaned shower room for the drivers as you will see in the photos of many hair follicles left behind from previous person. ‚Ä¶

Grabbed a quick snack after my shower and laundry. 1st, please put arrows on the washers and dryers so you know which pin pad to use.  I seen after it was in extremely small lettering on the screen. An arrow up and down by each would be ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of the six washer and dryers are out. I was here two weeks ago and there were two units out. I wanted to schedule a shower through my app and the system is down. The app said to see cashier. I guess Love's is having a network out issue ‚Ä¶

2/21/2025. For some reason the showers are down at 0323 this morning. The reason is that they are down, says ‚ÄúSandy‚Äù. She could not give me no reason other than they are down. I washed clothes yesterday and they were working just fine, ‚Ä¶

Long wait. Showers are not clean enough even thought they cut off you the water/shower  in the middle of you shower  basically your not guaranteed if your water works completely. When your ask the workers are so rude not good place at all. ‚Ä¶
Nice new store. Nice staff. Nice parking lot but I'm sure they will put a worthless Speedco right in the middle of it. No water pressure in the shower.

Opened Aug 1, 2024
111 Truck parking
8 Diesel, 7 Shower
Bojangles,  Godfather's pizza, Loves Fresh Kitchen.

6mos update- AT&T still sucks here! üëéüèª

Shower is down. AT&T sucks here, very weak. üëéüèª ‚Ä¶
new store and they just told me we camt shower bcause they dont have enough ppl to clean the showers .WHAT A JOKEEE this is the america we live in
One of the best Loves I have been stopped at.  Clean, big parking lot, def at the pump.   RV stop hookups.
Loves always have the cleanest showers, but they need to turn up that water pressure and that hot water heater and they will be perfect

This was SUCH a nice stop! Everything was clean and well kept. There was a dog park area, that my dogs were super excited for after being cramped in the car all day. The bathroom was really clean, and there were lots of supplies stocked. We're definitely going to stop here again when we travel by.

Excellent location with good employees. Clean restrooms üöΩ

So check em out if you‚Äôre ever in the neighborhood and Holla at a Playaüëåüèæ ‚Ä¶
As always love‚Äôs travel centers delivered a very contemporary new location,  very beautiful, clean very modern and as always friendly faces.

Heard the bathrooms are clean. Driving from FL to GA to visit family and had a old ass dog with me that has separation anxiety so had to hold it in for 6 hours. Didn't use the dog park but off the side there's grass area that we walked around. Saw there was a drive thru for food but didn't stop this time.

Clean and fairly quiet truck stop in the back. The 5 space RV parking is level side to side on a concrete pad. The utilities are at the left rear of site. If you're unfamiliar with the hose bubbles style,lift up the handle pull down on the hose ring. They do shut off utilities at noon.

Love's is always a great place to stop, clean and super friendly staff. No long wait times, fast easy checkout. Special shoutout to Shawna,  she's always a ray of sunshine and brightens your day! So nice to see excellent customer service at a convenience store!! Great job Love's!

As often as possible while traveling, we stop at Love's. Why? Great fountain drinks, snacks, fresh food, clean bathrooms, safe locations and friendly staff! Thank you for being reliable and dependable.
